original_text: They will fall over each other when nobody is running after them. They will not be strong enough to fight their enemies.
korean_text: 그들은 쫓는 자가 없어도 칼 앞에 있음 같이 서로 짓밟혀 넘어지리니 너희가 원수들을 맞설 힘이 없을 것이요

sentences.original_text: They will fall over each other
when nobody is running after them
They will not be strong enough
